Container.Name: owncloud-client
Container.Overview: Dockerized ownCloud CLI Client (owncloudcmd) to sync from any supported ownCloud-like enviroment.

Config.Name: OC_PASS
Config.Description: Password or App-Token for the ownCloud user

Config.Name: OC_SERVER
Config.Description: ownCloud Server URL, with, if necessary, with port

Config.Name: OC_URLPATH
Config.Description: Server path to the ownCloud instance

Config.Name: OC_FILEPATH
Config.Description: Only sync one specific folder. Use '/' for everything

Config.Name: RUN_UID
Config.Description: UID for the occlient user and sync location

Config.Name: RUN_GID
Config.Description: GID for the occlient user and sync location

Config.Name: OC_WEBDAV
Config.Description: In case the webdav path is not default, you can change it here

Config.Name: TRUST_SELFSIGN
Config.Description: Set to 1 to trust self-signed certificates

Config.Name: SYNC_HIDDEN
Config.Description: Set to 1 to sync all hidden files within the specified ownCloud directory

Config.Name: SILENCE_OUTPUT
Config.Description: Set to 0 to get more verbose output

Config.Name: RUN_INTERVAL
Config.Description: Interval in seconds at which the client will run and check for changes

Config.Name: Sync Location
Config.Description: The path where the files will be synced to

Container.Description: Dockerized ownCloud CLI Client (owncloudcmd) to sync from any supported ownCloud-like enviroment.
